Pre-Game Insights: The Boston Red Sox have a team on-base percentage of.324 and a batting average of.258 this season.
The Red Sox have a team ERA of 4.14 and a WHIP of 1.26, allowing 1,145 base hits and 554 earned runs this season.
Boston's bullpen has a save percentage of 55.0% and has been effective in high-leverage situations.
The Red Sox have a strong defensive efficiency of 70.2% and a fielding percentage of.980 this season.
Brayan Bello will start for the Red Sox, with a FIP of 4.41 and a WHIP of 1.421, having allowed 376 base hits and 124 walks this season.
Luis Severino will start for the Mets, with a FIP of 3.8 and a WHIP of 1.199, having allowed 787 hits and 373 earned runs in his career.
